description.0: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

0.0: ATK will be increased by <cryo>16%</cryo> for 15s after being affected by Pyro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s. All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by <cryo>12%</cryo> for 15s after being affected by Hydro, Cryo, Electro, or Dendro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.
